# Multi-Step Planning Phases

## Phase 1 — Scope and Context

- Define goal, scope, and non-goals
- Identify backend/client impact
- Capture dependencies and blockers

## Phase 2 — Requirement to Issue Mapping

- Break requirements into PR-sized issues
- Keep backend-first ordering where needed
- Add explicit acceptance criteria and validation

## Phase 3 — Traceability and Risks

- Map requirements to issues and owners
- Document risks and mitigations
- Define sequencing and concurrency

## Phase 4 — Delivery Readiness

- Confirm validation commands by repo
- Confirm handoff clarity
- Confirm no unresolved blockers
